Body:
t = Template(
    """
        <%!
            callcount = [0]
        %>
        <%page cached="True"/>
        this is foo
        <%
        callcount[0] += 1
        %>
        callcount: ${callcount}
"""
    )
m = self._install_mock_cache(t)
t.render()
t.render()
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['this is foo', 'callcount: [1]']
assert m.kwargs == {}
